price: 11. Dheh: Waxaa idin oofsan Malakul mowd la idiin xil saaray, markaasaa xagga Rabbigiin la idin soo celin.
arabic: ۞ قُلۡ يَتَوَفَّىٰكُم مَّلَكُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ ٱلَّذِي وُكِّلَ بِكُمۡ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمۡ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul yatawaffākum malaku al-mawti alladhī wukkila bikum thumma ilā rabbikum tur'jaʿūna
